title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any Ollama model in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style interface) with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, embeddings, list/delete models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Simple Go CLI that wraps Ollama endpoints for quick prompting from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app that talks to Ollama; easy one-click deploy to Streamlit Cloud.

title: Ollama Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting, and showcasing Ollama projects.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration offering OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library and FluentExtensions for chatting with Ollama models from C#.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & GPU) and compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module that injects an Ollama service for chat, streaming and embeddings.

title: ollama-hnsw
summary: Lightning-fast local semantic search by combining Ollama embeddings with Hnswlib.

title: ollama-hackernews discussion
summary: HN thread comparing Ollama performance, model quantization, and GPU offloading tips.

title: ollama-powershell
summary: PowerShell module wrapping Ollama REST endpoints for Windows admins and scripters.
